Yeah, that's probably true, but in the Element's case, there's more a
chance for accuracy. I think Cyndro is a full bot, except for his body
is a ship instead of a robot, so he would be able to see who's helping
and who's hurting, and fire on the ones that are hurting. Ask Jen,
though, I don't know much about her ship.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: But there is so much going on, and its all chaotic, how can you
be
> sure you might not hit a wrong target with so many on the field.
Also, if
> they are big and guns, then there is a chance of the blast hitting
people
> that are close. I just dont think its good strategy.
